import React from 'react'; import './reg.css'; import arrow from './arrow.png'; import plus from './plus.png'; const RegistrationForm = ({ avatar, firstName, lastName, email, birthDate, password, confirmPassword, handleChange, handleSubmit, }) => { const handleAvatarChange = (event) => { const selectedFile = event.target.files[0]; handleChange({ target: { name: 'avatar', value: URL.createObjectURL(selectedFile) } }); }; return (
); }; export default RegistrationForm;
